entry.title: What is /etc/passwd and /etc/shadow files
entry.summary: Hi everyone. In this blog post I will be explaining what is the difference between /etc/passwd and /etc/shadow as it always confuse new comers to linux prerequisite In Linux, a user is identified using a unique identifier called as user id (UID). Each user belongs to at least one group called the user’s primary group. Like user, a group is also identified with the help of a unique identifier ...
